papers.title: Beam-beam Limit, Number of IP's and Energy
authors: We discuss beam-beam limit in Higgs factories for luminosity limit and beam lifetime. Higgs factory is very high energy circular collider. The damping time is order of 100 turns. A high beam-beam tune shift (~0.1) is achieved in LEP
and is adopted as design value based on the experience. We now review this point
Cornell Laboratory for Accelerator-Based Sciences and Education
CESR has operated since 1983 with multi-bunch pretzel orbits to realize substantial improvements in luminosity. Building on this experience
we suggest what aspects of the CESR pretzel experience are relevant in the design of a circular e+e− Higgs Factory as well as possible new phenomena.
institutions: Funding: Work funded by multiple grants from the US National Science Foundation
